anathema: Allow a slight to go unrecognized, avoid repaying a debt, force others into debts you know are unpayable
edict: Help reclaim just debts, seek appropriate vengeance against transgressions
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dranngvit (The Debt Minder)](/Deities.aspx?ID=446)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Help reclaim just debts, seek appropriate vengeance against transgressions

**Anathema** Allow a slight to go unrecognized, avoid repaying a debt, force others into debts you know are unpayable

**Area of Concern**
Debt, pursuit, vengeance

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=385)

**Domains** [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Tailwind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1711)

- **2nd**
[Knock](/Spells.aspx?ID=1581)

- **5th**
[Magic Passage](/Spells.aspx?ID=1591)

</column>
name: Dranngvit (The Debt Minder)
